headline.main: England Boss Allardyce Convinced the Time Is Right for Him
headline.print_headline: England Boss Allardyce Convinced the Time Is Right for Him

docs.snippet: New England manager Sam Allardyce believes it is just the right time in his career for him to be taking on what some have called the impossible job....

headline.main: The 888 and Rank Group Join Forces to Bid for William Hill
headline.print_headline: The 888 and Rank Group Join Forces to Bid for William Hill

docs.snippet: Online gambling group 888 Holdings and casino operator Rank Group are joining forces with a view to making a bid for William Hill, the British bookmaker that fired its chief executive on Thursday for losing ground online to rivals....
docs.lead_paragraph: Online gambling group 888 Holdings and casino operator Rank Group are joining forces with a view to making a bid for William Hill, the British bookmaker that fired its chief executive on Thursday for losing ground online to rivals.

headline.main: UK Conservative Party Chairman Says Brexit Must Be Binding
headline.print_headline: UK Conservative Party Chairman Says Brexit Must Be Binding

docs.snippet: Britain's vote to leave the European Union must be binding, the chairman of Britain's ruling Conservative Party said on Sunday, and the exit process will be started before the next general election....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's vote to leave the European Union must be binding, the chairman of Britain's ruling Conservative Party said on Sunday, and the exit process will be started before the next general election.

headline.main: Soldiers in Coup Have Badly Harmed Turkey: Chief of General Staff
headline.print_headline: Soldiers in Coup Have Badly Harmed Turkey: Chief of General Staff

docs.snippet: The chief of Turkey's military General Staff said on Sunday soldiers involved in last weekend's failed coup had done great harm to the country and would face "the most severe punishment", private broadcaster NTV reported....
docs.lead_paragraph: The chief of Turkey's military General Staff said on Sunday soldiers involved in last weekend's failed coup had done great harm to the country and would face "the most severe punishment", private broadcaster NTV reported.

headline.main: What Are the Top 20 Priciest Medicare Prescription Drugs?
headline.print_headline: What Are the Top 20 Priciest Medicare Prescription Drugs?

docs.snippet: A look at Medicare's top 20 priciest prescription drugs in 2015, ranked by their cost above the program's "catastrophic" coverage threshold. Medicare's catastrophic protection kicks in after a beneficiary has spent a given amount of their own mone...
docs.lead_paragraph: A look at Medicare's top 20 priciest prescription drugs in 2015, ranked by their cost above the program's "catastrophic" coverage threshold. Medicare's catastrophic protection kicks in after a beneficiary has spent a given amount of their own money, $4,850 this year. The beneficiary pays only 5 percent, while their insurer pays 15 percent, and taxpayers cover 80 percent. Catastrophic spending is a large and growing share of total costs, threatening to make Medicare's popular prescription plan financially unsustainable.

headline.main: AP Exclusive: Medicare Safeguard Overwhelmed by Pricey Drugs
headline.print_headline: AP Exclusive: Medicare Safeguard Overwhelmed by Pricey Drugs

docs.snippet: A safeguard for Medicare beneficiaries has become a way for drugmakers to get paid billions of dollars for pricey medications at taxpayer expense, government numbers show....
docs.lead_paragraph: A safeguard for Medicare beneficiaries has become a way for drugmakers to get paid billions of dollars for pricey medications at taxpayer expense, government numbers show.

headline.main: Munich Gunman Planned Attacks for a Year-Bavarian Officials
headline.print_headline: Munich Gunman Planned Attacks for a Year-Bavarian Officials

docs.snippet: The 18-year-old German-Iranian gunman who killed nine people in Munich on Friday began planning the attack a year ago after visiting the German city of Winnenden where another teenager killed 15 people in 2009, Bavarian officials said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The 18-year-old German-Iranian gunman who killed nine people in Munich on Friday began planning the attack a year ago after visiting the German city of Winnenden where another teenager killed 15 people in 2009, Bavarian officials said on Sunday.

headline.main: Feliciano Lopez Wins Swiss Open for 1st Clay-Court Title
headline.print_headline: Feliciano Lopez Wins Swiss Open for 1st Clay-Court Title

headline.main: Vanquished Stormers Criticise Super Rugby Format
headline.print_headline: Vanquished Stormers Criticise Super Rugby Format

docs.snippet: Stormers coach Robbie Fleck and captain Schalk Burger joined a growing chorus of criticism of the cumbersome Super Rugby format after the undercooked South African team were dumped out of the competition at the weekend by New Zealand's Chiefs....
docs.lead_paragraph: Stormers coach Robbie Fleck and captain Schalk Burger joined a growing chorus of criticism of the cumbersome Super Rugby format after the undercooked South African team were dumped out of the competition at the weekend by New Zealand's Chiefs.
